# Ajay Bind - Full Stack Developer

## Overview
Ajay Bind is a Full Stack Developer specializing in the MERN stack, which includes MongoDB, Express, React, Node.js, and Next.js. He focuses on building scalable web applications and is open to collaboration opportunities.
